subject: Suits and Litigation
Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The University of Missouri has settled a wrongful-death lawsuit filed by the family of Aaron O’Neal, a former reserve linebacker who collapsed during a 2005 workout. Records filed this week in Boone County Circuit Court refer to an undisclosed settlement.
